mapper.sql: register_id, register_no, activity_id, user_id, nick_name, memo, portrait, create_time, del_flag
mapper.insert: insert into act_activity_register (register_id, register_no, activity_id, user_id, nick_name, memo, portrait, create_time, del_flag, content) values (#{registerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into act_activity_register
register_id,
register_no,
activity_id,
user_id,
nick_name,
memo,
portrait,
create_time,
del_flag,
content,

mapper.update:
update act_activity_register
register_no = #{registerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
portrait = #{portrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where register_id = #{registerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update act_activity_register set register_no = #{registerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, portrait = #{portrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where register_id = #{registerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update act_activity_register set register_no = #{registerNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, portrait = #{portrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where register_id = #{registerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select IFNULL(MAX(register_no),0) from act_activity_register where del_flag = '0' and activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT t_r.register_id AS registerId, t_r.register_no AS registerNo, t_r.activity_id AS activityId, t_r.user_id AS userId, t_r.nick_name AS nickName, t_r.memo, t_r.portrait, DATE_FORMAT(t_r.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime, t_r.content, SUM(CASE t_v.register_id IS NULL WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS voteCount, SUM(CASE t_v.voter_id WHEN #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)>0 AS voteStatus FROM act_activity_register t_r LEFT JOIN act_activity_vote t_v ON t_r.register_id = t_v.register_id AND t_v.del_flag = '0' WHERE t_r.del_flag = '0' AND t_r.register_id = #{registerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY t_r.register_id

select
from act_activity_register WHERE del_flag = '0' and activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by register_no desc limit 0,1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (@i := @i + 1) AS rankingNo,t_v.* FROM (SELECT (@i := 0)) t , (SELECT t_r.register_id AS registerId, t_r.register_no AS registerNo, t_r.activity_id AS activityId, t_r.user_id AS userId, t_r.nick_name AS nickName, t_r.memo, t_r.portrait, DATE_FORMAT(t_r.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime, t_r.content, SUM(CASE t_v.register_id IS NULL WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS voteCount FROM act_activity_register t_r LEFT JOIN act_activity_vote t_v ON t_r.register_id = t_v.register_id AND t_v.del_flag = '0' WHERE t_r.del_flag = '0' and activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY t_r.register_id ORDER BY voteCount DESC, t_r.register_no ASC) t_v) t WHERE t.registerId = #{registerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
